title: 3D sponge loaded with cisplatin–CS–calcium alginate MPs utilized as a void-filling prosthesis for the efficient postoperative prevention of tumor recurrence and metastasis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7517-7527
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA07516H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yihong Yang, Genlan Ye, Xiaozhong Qiu
This study devised a novel 3D sponge implant containing cisplatin-loaded chitosan–calcium alginate MPs capable of exerting combined chemotherapy and hemostasis effects.
